mapper.select: SELECT A.TRANSACTION_DATE as transactionDate, A.TOT_SITE_FEE as thisTotSiteFee, B.TOT_SITE_FEE as lastTotSiteFee FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS transaction_date , NVL(SUM(SITE_FEES),0) AS tot_site_fee FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DATE ) A, --올해 ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE+365, 'YYYYMMDD') AS transaction_date , NVL(SUM(SITE_FEES),0) AS tot_site_fee FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7-365 AND SYSDATE-365 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE+365, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DATE ) B --작년 WHERE A.TRANSACTION_DATE = B.TRANSACTION_DATE(+)
